FAQ:
%[How do I apply for a vacation placement or training contract?](postback:how_do-I)
 %[What are your application deadlines?](postback:application_deadlines)
 %[I am completing a Law degree – does it matter what modules I choose to study?](postback:modules)
HOW DO I APPLY FOR A VACATION PLACEMENT: All applications must be made online using the ‘Apply’ section of the graduate website. Candidates who undertake a vacation scheme will automatically be considered for a training contract and so are not required to make a separate training contract application.
I AM COMPLETING A LAW DEGREE - DOES IT M:
Pinsent Masons does not stipulate that you need to have studied particular modules as part of your undergraduate studies, however, we would expect that students who are keen to pursue a career in commercial law will have taken the opportunity to further their knowledge in this area through choosing relevant modules, when the opportunity has arisen.
